data.event: Now, he's going full time with a restaurant that opened this month on White Street about a mile east of downtown Rock Hill.
The building on White Street has changed hands a number of times over the years.

event.title: stopped in for a cheeseburger one afternoon last week

data.event: Jamison, the father of former University of North Carolina basketball star and NBA standout Antawn Jamison, stopped in for a cheeseburger one afternoon last week.
Monday brings the rib plate special, with beef stew not far behind on Tuesday.
